transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Yes sir, very good afternoon.
Yeah, good afternoon sir.
Sir, is your net, is your net is stable right now?
Sir, actually I came for another customer place. So today we can't able to connect sir.
Tomorrow morning surely we will connect sir.
Okay, so we will connect tomorrow and we got a, I mean, we got the request from you that you wanted a video meet. So can I, yeah.
Hello.
Yeah, tell me sir.
Yes sir, I'm saying, can I close your video meet request and we can connect.
Okay, you can close that sir, not an issue. Tomorrow you can reconnect that video meet.
Yeah, I will call you tomorrow around 11:00. Okay. Okay sir. We can connect on Google video meet.
Okay sir. And I'm closing your video meet request now and you will get a feedback. If you are satisfied just submit the yes. Okay.
Okay sir.
Alright sir, thank you.
Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to connect due to location.

- Customer requested a video meet.



Resolution:

- Executive will call tomorrow around 11:00 AM.

- Executive closed the video meet request.

- Executive asked for feedback after the call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, connection, feedback
